location.physicalLocation: British Library: India Office Records and Private Papers

titleInfo.title: Letter no.263 of 1856 from Henry Anderson, Secretary to the Government of Bombay, to Commander Felix Jones, Acting Resident in the Persian Gulf

mods.abstract: The letter is an acknowledgement of receipt of Jones’s earlier letter relating to the shipwreck and plunder of a vessel under British colours at Sharjah. Anderson writes that the Government approves of Jones’s proceedings, and that the Acting Resident should seek the fullest possible compensation for the outrage.
